types.html:
psellisme m (plural psellismes)

  1. (dated, medicine) stuttering; dysphemia
  2. (linguistics, orthophony) a generic term used to describe all faults of pronunciation
    • 1997, Claude Gagnière, Pour tout l'or des mots‎[1], Robert Laffont, page 133:
      Les spécialistes distinguent onze espèces de psellismes aux noms imprononçables.
      Specialists distinguish eleven types of psellisms with unpronounceable names.
trans: a generic term used to describe all faults of pronunciation

title: psellisme
pronunHtml: •  IPA(key): /psɛ.lism/
